name: yiu man lung ken
content: I received the Bachelor Degree in Computer Engineering and the PhD Degree in Computer Science from the University of Hong Kong in 2002 and 2006, respectively. Then, I worked at Aalborg University from 2006 to 2009. I am currently a professor at Hong Kong Polytechnic University. My research focuses on databases, in particular query processing topics on spatiotemporal data and multidimensional data.

name: yiu man lung ken
content:
Research projects
Advancing Learned Index Structures for Databases via Non-linear Functions (PI, Hong Kong GRF 152043/23E, 2024-2026)
Exploiting Smart Memory/Storage for Accelerating Data Mining on Vector Data (PI, Hong Kong GRF 152018/20E, 2021-2023)
Fast Approximate Data Analytics for Analytic Databases (PI, Hong Kong GRF 152050/19E, 2020-2022)
Efficient Spatial Data Management for Crowdsourced Transportation (PI, Hong Kong GRF 152196/16E, 2017-2019)
Leveraging Modern CPUs for Efficient Query Processing on Time Series Data (PI, Hong Kong GRF 152043/15E, 2016-2018)
Scalable Retrieval Techniques for Massive High-Dimensional Data (PI, Hong Kong GRF 152201/14E, 2015-2017)
Automatic Performance Tuning of Spatial Indexes for Dynamic Workloads in Spatial Databases (PI, Hong Kong GRF 5302/12E, 2013-2015)
Trustworthy Processing of Shortest Path Queries Over Online Road Network Databases (PI, Hong Kong GRF 5333/10E, 2010-2013)

PUBLICATIONS
Journal Articles

name: yiu man lung ken
content:
